prompts: Create a majestic bird Pokemon with vibrant red feathers and golden accents.
Imagine a legendary creature soaring through the sky with rainbow-like wings.
Generate a mythical Pokemon that embodies the spirit of fire and renewal.
Design a powerful flying-type Pokemon that radiates warmth and light.
Make a Pokemon that has a striking combination of red, green, and yellow colors.
Show me a Pokemon that symbolizes hope and rebirth with its fiery presence.
Give me a unique bird Pokemon that can control fire and has a radiant aura.
